title: The Story of Minecraft's Most EVIL Villager
author: Dragonic
description:
This is the story and theory of the origin story of the Minecraft Villager. Who is he? And what is his secrets? That's what we uncover in this Minecraft Video. This theory / lore was wild! Minecraft's most evil villager used to be just another innocent humble villager. He and his followers would eventually become the illagers.
